extension.name: Vertical Menu
extension.author: Balint Polgarfi
extension.description: All-in-one responsive menu solution for Joomla!

param.exclude: menutype joomlamenu joomlamenutype \\w+categoryid showproducts showcontents showitems zooapps zoocategories
param.label:
Import / Export
menu settings
param.description: Import / Export all menu settings expect the menu structure

param.name: visibility
param.label: Visibility
param.description: With this option you can show or hide the menu on specific devices.

param.name: position
param.label: Menu positioning
param.description: Don't forget to select a module position from the modal display of pre-defined positions

param.name: maxheight
param.label: Menu max-height
param.description: This parameter has no effect when menu is in sidebar (0 - No limit for height)

param.name: logolink
param.label: Link for the logo image
param.description: Set link for the logo image. If you would like custom link, select the custom value, then add the link with the input field.

param.name: animatemenuitem
param.label: Animate menu-items separately
param.description: Animate menu-items separately with a small time shift

param.name: jquery
param.label: Load jQuery on J!2.5
param.description: Load jQuery library on Joomla! v2.5

param.name: ignorejs
param.label: Rocket Loader fix
param.description: Rocket Loader will ignore the init script in Automatic Mode

param.name: hidepopupunder
param.label: Hide fixed popup menu after scroll under width

param.name: vmLangFix
param.label: Language fix for Virtuemart
param.description: Enable this parameter if you have issues with multi-lingual menus

param.name: custom_css
param.label: Custom CSS
